channel.title: PrimeVue :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Install PrimeVue One of the first things we may want to install in our application is a library of ready-to-use components that we can use to build our application with. This can drastically cut down on the time it takes to build an application, and these libraries often come with a range of features that make our applications both user-friendly and very accessible. While there are many different libraries to choose from, weâ€™ll use the PrimeVue library.
